{{Description|An engineer from [[Fontaine]] has arrived at the outskirts of [[The Chasm]] to study harmonic motion between gems known as Vibro-Crystats in an effort to clear the name of his colleague, who had accused of faking his data. '''Vibro-Crystal Verification''' is an upcoming [[Event]] in [[Version 3.5]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/03/14 10:00 - 2023/03/27 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 28 or above
* Complete the [[Archon Quest]] "[[Rite of Parting]]"

===Summary===
* During the event, equip your party with a Vibro-Crystal Harmonics Schema and take part in the challenges. Defeat the enemies within the time limit and earn points to obtain rewards such as [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], and [[Weapon Ascension Material]]s.
